header_text: You just received recognition for a project you worked on. You’ve only received congratulations from a few people, and you thought you’d have more reactions by now. You wonder if people aren't congratulating you because they are busy.

elements.text: You just received recognition for a project you worked on. You’ve only received congratulations from a few people, and you thought you’d have more reactions by now. You wonder if people aren't congratulating you because they are busy.
